nodes.text: A B1-Series battle droid was used by the Confederacy of Independent Systems as Asajj Ventress' bodyguard in her journey to Coruscant.

Ventress had been sent to Coruscant to take probably an attack on the Galactic Senate, where representatives of Bureaucratosis give a speech (which in reality were only grunts and verses), to accompany the sadistic Dark Acolyte was a Separatist droid that could to feel emotions (so much so that could laugh).

Grand Master Yoda sensed danger, and found Ventress, then dueled with lightsabers, while escaping a class of Jedi from the Senate Building with an "infiltrator", Yoda and Cody, a commander of the Republic, imprisoned Asajj, but the droid escaped with some secret battle plans in a book titled Secret Battle Plans.

Later, Commander Cody, Gra nd Master Yoda and a young Han Solo (posing as "Ian") found and destroyed the droid on Hoth, in the guts of a Tauntaun, saving the plans, while on Coruscant the two fleets of the galaxy battling.
This droid is a principal villain in LEGO Star Wars: The Padawan Menace, since Asajj Ventress gives him the Secret Battle Plans of the Republic and her ship.
The droid is represented by a minifigure released by LEGO in 2003 for representing a droid at Geonosis.
